backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, permission checks, trade analyses, and per-user trade history with timestamp ordering.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping planned features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, live market data, derived trade inputs, validation, and running trade analyses.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for entering and saving a user's name with validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/CsvUploadPanel.t: CSV upload component that parses price data, computes indicators, and reports status or errors.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerGate.t: Displays a modal disclaimer that must be acknowledged, storing acceptance in session and controlling access flow.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryD: Shows detailed information about a past trade analysis, including inputs, results, and computed metrics.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryP: Fetches and displays trade analysis history with loading, error, empty states, and detail view navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketData.ts: Manages market data fetch state with loading, error handling, and reset functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating queries are organized elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradeAnalysis.ts: Provides a React Query mutation to analyze a trade via the actor and refreshes trade history on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradeHistory.ts: Fetches full trade history and individual trades using React Query with actor validation and graceful error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Retrieves and saves the caller’s user profile using React Query, with cache invalidation on save.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/csv/parsePriceCsv.ts: Parses CSV price data into typed objects with validation and error collection, then sorts by date.
frontend/src/lib/indicators.ts: Computes SMA, support, resistance, and indicator bundles from price data or market data points.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/config.ts: Stores configuration and notes for the Alpha Vantage market data provider.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/deriveTradeI: Generates default entry, stop-loss, and take-profit levels from market data and indicators.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/fetchMarketD: Fetches intraday or fallback daily market data from Alpha Vantage with input validation and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/types.ts: Defines types for price points, market data results, and market data errors.
frontend/src/lib/session.ts: Manages a disclaimer acknowledgment flag using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/tradeMath.ts: Provides utility functions for computing profit/loss and formatting currency and percentages.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates required fields and numeric input with optional positivity checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URL search and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s current state, requirements, issues, and feature definitions for a stock-analysis web app.
